AD_Guards_001.synopsis: Looping ADs between two duergar supervising some deep rothe that are being used to clear rubble. The duergar react to three main states: the rothe aren't working, after being scared by something, the rothe are dead, and the rothe have been calmed. The duergar are grim and vicious - certainly not concerned about animal welfare.

AD_RotheStartWorking.synopsis: Herdmaster exclaims when the rothe start bashing the rubble in.

AD_RotheFrenzy.synopsis: The duergar reacts to some deep rothe (bull-like creatures) turning hostile.

AD_Guards_002.synopsis: A duergar guard ADs about some deep rothe (beasts of burden) being guarded. Comments on how the animals are scared of something (or how they've been calmed, or killed). Grim and unsympathetic.

AD_Guards_001_0.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_0.text: Keep at it, you ugly beasts. Got to make up for lost time!
AD_Guards_001_0.context: NodeContext: Yelling at some deep rothe (beasts of burden)

AD_Guards_001_1.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_1.text: Look at 'em - all that brawn and they're trembling like leaves.
AD_Guards_001_1.context: NodeContext: Addressing one of his fellow duergar re: the scared deep rothe.

AD_Guards_001_12.speaker: Grundril
AD_Guards_001_12.context: NodeContext: 'huh?' The reference to trees is lost on him.

AD_Guards_001_6.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_6.text: Leaves. Like on trees. Up on the surface... forget it!

AD_Guards_001_2.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_2.text: Get moving or I'll swap my cane for an axe!
AD_Guards_001_2.context: NodeContext: Yelling at a couple of beasts of burden who've been spooked by something and stopped working.

AD_Guards_001_3.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_3.text: Quit whimpering or I'll take a slice off your haunches for my supper!
AD_Guards_001_3.context: NodeContext: Yelling at a couple of beasts of burden who've been spooked by something and stopped working.

AD_Guards_001_4.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_4.text: Any sign they're slacking off again, you thrash some diligence into them. Got it?
AD_Guards_001_4.context: NodeContext: Issuing directions to another duergar

AD_Guards_001_7.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_7.text: Those rothé better keep behaving, if they know what's good for 'em.
AD_Guards_001_7.context: NodeContext: Not directed at anyone in particular

AD_Guards_001_8.speaker: Grundril
AD_Guards_001_8.text: What do you reckon got them all worked up like that?

AD_Guards_001_13.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_13.text: I don't know. Maybe they caught sight of your mug.

AD_Guards_001_9.speaker: Grundril
AD_Guards_001_9.text: Maybe they're hungry. Could fetch 'em some moss.
AD_Guards_001_9.context: NodeContext: Making a suggestion to another duergar

AD_Guards_001_5.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_5.text: Shove moss in your own gob and stay quiet. They've been fed plenty.

AD_Guards_001_10.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_Guards_001_10.text: Gods damn it. And those were some good cattle. Got no patience for this!

AD_RotheStartWorking_0.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_RotheStartWorking_0.text: Drugh yes. That's it, ya beasts!
AD_RotheStartWorking_0.context: NodeContext: Drugh = DROOG. (Sounds like' food', not 'good.' "Fuck yes."

AD_RotheFrenzy_0.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_RotheFrenzy_0.text: Bloody rothé have lost it - put 'em down!
AD_RotheFrenzy_0.context: NodeContext: Row-thay. Reacting to some bull-like animals turning hostile. Jargh - fool. ZHARG!

AD_RotheFrenzy_1.speaker: Herdmaster Skarjall
AD_RotheFrenzy_1.text: Bloody rothé have lost it. Put 'em down - and the jargh, too!
AD_RotheFrenzy_1.context: NodeContext: Row-thay. Reacting to some bull-like animals turning hostile. Jargh - fool. ZHARG!

AD_Guards_002_0.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_0.text: Keep at it! Clear every bit of rock!
AD_Guards_002_0.context: NodeContext: Shouting at some deep rothe (beasts of burden)

AD_Guards_002_1.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_1.text: Can't be that they're hungry. We feed 'em better than the slaves.
AD_Guards_002_1.context: NodeContext: Annoyed. Spoken out loud in general

AD_Guards_002_2.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_2.text: Should've just got some slaves up here to clear this out.
AD_Guards_002_2.context: NodeContext: Annoyed. Spoken out loud in general

AD_Guards_002_3.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_3.text: Never heard rothé make sounds like that before. Not without a spear in its guts.
AD_Guards_002_3.context: NodeContext: Annoyed. Spoken out loud in general

AD_Guards_002_4.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_4.context: NodeContext: Shouting at some deep rothe (beasts of burden)

AD_Guards_002_5.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_5.text: Them rothé shift rock faster than slaves when you finally get 'em working...

AD_Guards_002_6.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_6.text: Damn it. Ain't but one way we're dealing with this shit.

AD_Guards_002_7.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_7.text: Might actually get this poxy job done now.

AD_Guards_002_8.speaker: Morgya
AD_Guards_002_8.text: Should be out on the hunt, not watching scared livestock.
AD_Guards_002_8.context: NodeContext: Annoyed. Spoken out loud in general
